paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data from affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.phenotype: metastatic adenocarcinoma of the prostate with neuroendocrine differentiation

individual_records.phenotype_details: metastatic adenocarcinoma of the prostate with neuroendocrine differentiation
individual_records.evidence_sentence: An 81‐year‐old male presented with prostatic adenocarcinoma with neuroendocrine differentiation accompanied by metastatic lung nodule and brain metastases.

functional_data.summary: The somatic mutation is associated with aggressive forms of prostate cancer.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is a somatic mutation identified in the patient's tumor.

patients.phenotype: prostate cancer in the father and breast cancer in the son

individual_records.phenotype_details: metastatic adenocarcinoma of the prostate with neuroendocrine differentiation
individual_records.evidence_sentence: An 81‐year‐old male presented with prostatic adenocarcinoma with neuroendocrine differentiation accompanied by metastatic lung nodule and brain metastases.
The patient's son had been diagnosed with breast cancer 2.5 years ago and was found to have the same germline BRCA2 mutation.

functional_data.summary: The germline mutation is associated with increased cancer risk.

variants.segregation_data: The germline mutation segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The mutation was observed in the ClinVar allele ID 67304.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
